attributes.action: Scottish parliament use the veto right and block the Brexit from EU.
attributes.background: We the undersigned call upon Scottish parliament to use the veto right and block the British Exit from the EU.

rejection.details:
The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:

http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
